title: Can't log into alpha
body: Hi, I tried logging into the alpha client to see if the reward icon was available yet (I'm aware that it will probably not be until after the patch), and I discovered that I can't get my client to open. I'm having no issues with the legacy client. I tried accessing alpha by both my desktop and toolbar icons. My mouse icon will get the circle to indicate that something is loading, but after a few moments it goes away and the client never begins to do anything. I'm not exactly sure what to do about it? Does anyone have any ideas?

replies.body:
Can you try launching the Alpha Client from the shortcut inside your League Installation folder? It should be located in the following directory:

> **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

Let me know if this worked.

I'd absolutely love to, but you're talking to someone who's hyper illiterate when it comes to technology. I honestly have no clue where to find that and my little search thing on my toolbar isn't helping me find it in the least :/
I really don't want to miss out on the icon just because it won't open. I played the alpha way too much to want to lose the icon :(
I randomly just tried to open it and after like 5 minutes of nothing it finally opened. I still didn't get my icon, but the client did open and allow me to log in.

Glad to hear you're able to use the Alpha client again. Regarding the Icon, I'd give it some time, as our Icon distribution has typically taken a few weeks due to how many players we're giving icons.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
